typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	enableGDPRDelete as boolean (true()),
	enableOptOut as boolean (false())
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	moveFiles: ['changes','processed'],
	modifiedBefore: (toTimestamp(minus(currentUTC(), minutes(5)))),
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['changes/*.parquet']) ~> source1
source1 split(!isNull(byName('id')) && byName('reason') == 'deleted' && $enableGDPRDelete,
	isNull(byName('id')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(deletedData, updatedData, unknown)
ConditionalSplit1@updatedData derive(location = @(address1=byName('address1_line1'),
		address2=byName('address1_line2'),
		address3=byName('address1_line3'),
		city=byName('address1_city'),
		zipCode=byName('address1_postalcode')),
		birthDate = byName('birthdate'),
		created = byName('createdon'),
		email = byName('emailaddress1'),
		firstName = byName('firstname'),
		gender = iif(isNull(byName('gendercode')), 'unknown', iif(toString(byName('gendercode')) == "1", 'male', 'female')),
		lastModified = toTimestamp(byName('modifiedon')),
		lastName = byName('lastname'),
		phone = byName('telephone1'),
		externalId = byName('contactid'),
		blackListEmail = toBoolean(byName('donotemail')),
		blackListFax = toBoolean(byName('donotfax')),
		blackListPhone = toBoolean(byName('donotphone')),
		blackListPostalMail = toBoolean(byName('donotbulkpostalmail'))) ~> GenerateNewColumns
Select1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> MarkUpsert
ConditionalSplit1@deletedData keyGenerate(output(rowNum as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 aggregate(groupBy(key = rowNum%50),
	userIdList = collect(byName('id'))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(key = 'ADF' + toString(currentDate('UTC')) + toString(uuid())) ~> DerivedColumn1
Exists1 window(over(externalId),
	desc(lastModified, true),
	latest = max(lastModified)) ~> Window1
Window1 filter(lastModified == latest) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		location,
		birthDate,
		created,
		email,
		firstName,
		gender,
		lastModified,
		lastName,
		phone,
		externalId,
		each(match($enableOptOut&&startsWith(name,'blackList')))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
GenerateNewColumns, ConditionalSplit1@deletedData exists(externalId == byName('id'),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
MarkUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		externalId as string
	),
	format: 'adobecampaign',
	resourceName: 'profile',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['externalId'],
	excludeFields:[('blackListEmail'),('blackListFax'),('blackListPhone'),('blackListPostalMail')],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> WriteToAdobe
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'adobeprivacy',
	namespace: 'externalId',
	namespaceQualifier: 'custom',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> GDPRDelete

parameters{
	lastQueryTime as string (toString(subDays(currentUTC(),1)))
}
source(output(
		PKey as string,
		blackList as boolean,
		blackListAllLastModified as string,
		blackListEmail as boolean,
		blackListEmailLastModified as string,
		blackListFax as boolean,
		blackListFaxLastModified as string,
		blackListLastModified as string,
		blackListMobile as boolean,
		blackListMobileLastModified as string,
		blackListPhone as boolean,
		blackListPhoneLastModified as string,
		blackListPostalMail as boolean,
		blackListPostalMailLastModified as string,
		ccpaOptOut as boolean,
		ccpaOptOutLastModified as string,
		externalId as string,
		href as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'adobecampaign',
	resourceName: 'profileBlackListModified',
	filterMap: ['blackListLastModified'->($lastQueryTime)]) ~> ACS
Filter1 derive(contactid = externalId) ~> DerivedColumn1
ACS filter(externalId != '') ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		contactid,
		each(match(startsWith(name,'blackList')))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> D365Staging
